common.appDescription: A modern, extensible web application framework built with React and powered by plugins. Create scalable applications with ease.

tenant.title: Tenant Management
tenant.createTenantDescription: Create a new tenant to collaborate with others.

db.tenantNameExists: A tenant with the same name already exists.
db.tenantOwnerRoleNotFound: Template role "Owner" not found. System may not be initialized correctly.
db.tenantMemberNotMember: User is not a member of this tenant and cannot view its members.
db.tenantMemberNoPermission: User does not have permission to add members to this tenant.
db.tenantMemberEmailNotFound: User with this email not found.
db.roleNameEmpty: Role name cannot be null or empty.
db.rolePermissionNoPermission: User does not have permission to grant this permission.
db.systemAdminRoleNotFound: Admin role not found for the System tenant. Initialization might be incomplete.

tabs.welcome: Welcome to the admin panel. Please select a menu item to get started.
